titleStmt.title: To the King, upon His Majesties happy return
titleStmt.author: Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Marriot, in St. Dunstans Church-yard, Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Ed: Waller Esq.
Printer's name from colophon; imprint place and date from Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 9", "Juni. 9th The gift of ye author my sonn George's tutor. [illegible] Author mistaken for mr Clemon Ellis, Coll: Reg: Oxon Soc".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
